pre_caption: This scenery video captures a dramatic view from the surface of dark, choppy water. In the distance, a majestic range of snow-covered mountains stands against a clear twilight sky. The camera bobs in the waves, dipping below the surface to reveal the dark, teal-colored sea before rising again.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
